sentences.simplifiedText: 为了提高烹饪水平，他开始研究不同的烹饪手法。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了提高烹飪水平，他開始研究不同的烹飪手法。
sentences.pinyin: Wèile tígāo pēngrèn shuǐpíng, tā kāishǐ yánjiū bùtóng de pēngrèn shǒufǎ.
sentences.translation: In order to improve his cooking level, he began to study different cooking techniques.

sentences.pinyin: Tā yǒu hěn hǎo de jítā shǒufǎ.

sentences.simplifiedText: 通过观察别人打网球，他不断改进自己的手法。
sentences.traditionalText: 通過觀察別人打網球，他不斷改進自己的手法。
sentences.pinyin: Tōngguò guāncè biérén dǎ wǎngqiú, tā bùduàn gǎijìn zìjǐ de shǒufǎ.
sentences.translation: By watching others play tennis, he is continuously improving his technique.
